content:
ServiceRemotingDispatcher Constructor

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.dll

In this Article

Instantiates the ServiceRemotingDispatcher that uses the given service context and dispatches messages to the given service implementation.

public ServiceRemotingDispatcher (System.Fabric.ServiceContext serviceContext, Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.IService service);
Parameters
serviceContext
ServiceContext

Service context

service
IService

Service implementation that implements interfaces of type IService
